' Server side Method (VB): Freeze_Draft_of_Doc ' triggerd from: onAfterVersion ' attached to: ItemType = Document ' ' if a new generation of document is created and if previous status was "Draft" ' (or "Preliminary") ' then promote status to "Draft (frozen)" ' (this Status must added To the Document's life cycle map with a transition from ' Draft or Preliminary) ' ' This new status must also be defining a state permission without "update" permissions" ' (you can use "Released Document" permission for this) ' This will now prevent further modifications To old draft versions. ' ' last modified: 27-Oct-2008 ' 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
Dim plmIdentity As Aras.Server.Security.Identity Dim PermissionWasSet As Boolean = False
Dim innovator As Aras.IOM.Innovator = Me.newInnovator() Dim thisErr As Aras.IOM.Item = Nothing Dim qry As Aras.IOM.Item Dim tempItem As Aras.IOM.Item ' NOTE: this gets the document generation before the version action (not the lates ' exactly the one we want to freeze, if state is "Draft" Dim docId As String = Me.getId() Dim this_docGeneration As String = Me.getProperty("generation","") Dim this_docState As String = Me.getProperty("state","") Dim this_configId As String = Me.getProperty("config_id","")
If this_docState <> "" And (this_docState = "Draft" Or this_docState = "Preliminary") Then Dim wasLocked As Boolean = False ' qry = Me.newItem("Document","unlock") qry.setId(docId) qry.setAttribute ("version","0") qry = qry.apply() If (Not qry.isError()) Then wasLocked = True End If
plmIdentity = Aras.Server.Security.Identity.GetByName("Aras PLM") PermissionWasSet = Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.GrantIdentity(plmIdentity)
''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' ' promote draft and preliminary documents to "Draft (frozen) tempItem = Me.newItem("Document","promoteItem") tempItem.setId(docId) tempItem.setAttribute ("version","0") tempItem.setProperty("state","Draft (frozen)") tempItem = tempItem.apply() If (tempItem.isError()) Then thisErr = innovator.newError("Error promoting affected Document: " & tempItem.getErrorDetail()) Goto Freeze_old_Drafts_of_Doc_Return End If
If wasLocked Then ' lock again qry = Me.newItem("Document","lock") qry.setId(docId) qry.setAttribute ("version","0") qry = qry.apply() End If
End If
Freeze_old_Drafts_of_Doc_Return: 'reset If (PermissionWasSet=True) Then Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.RevokeIdentity(plmIdentity) End If
' finished If thisErr Is Nothing Then Return Me Else Return thisErr End If
